LanguageData.SrNoTargetTile: {0} has been shut down because it could not find a suitable target
LanguageData.SrChangeToSingleMode: Switch to single mode. The scanning area can be freely selected in this mode.
LanguageData.SrChangeToRangeMode: Switch to range mode. In this mode, the surrounding area will be scanned slowly.
LanguageData.SrChangeToSurfaceMode: Switch to the surface scan mode.
